title: Server Crash 26/02/15
body: Has the server died for everyone else?

replies.body: It's down for the update 5am AEDT

So for the first time in 4 hours, I had a team, that was mostly good (Our ADC fed the Jinx 16 kills in 24 minutes) but that was the best team I had had all night, so we were finally about to win my first game in 4 hours of struggling through the horror of the world and the server crashes, thank you League of Legends, for completely %%%%ing my night. You %%%%ing %%%%suck, thank you so %%%%ing much.

- Love Jazz McGaw.
